entry.string: The group name as it is called in your theme.
entry.translation: Zee gruoop neme-a es it is celled in yuoor zeeme-a.

entry.string: The individual instances which belong in this group in order as they appear.
entry.translation: Zee indeefidooel instunces vheech belung in thees gruoop in oorder es zeey eppeer. Hurty flurty schnipp schnipp!

entry.string: The template that is loaded for this block group. The templates are defined in themes/themename/blocks.
entry.translation: Zee templete-a thet is lueded fur thees bluck gruoop. Zee templetes ere-a deffeened in themes/zeemeneme-a/blocks. Um gesh dee bork, bork!

entry.string: This is the specific action that you can take with the block. Either edit or delete the block group.
entry.translation: Thees is zee speceeffic ecshun thet yuoo cun teke-a veet zee bluck. Ieezeer ideet oor delete-a zee bluck gruoop.
